ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cycsubg2cl.x | |- X = ( Base ` G ) |

| 3 |  | cycsubg2cl.k | |- K = ( mrCls ` ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_subgacs | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( SubGrp ` G ) e. ( ACS ` X ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_acsmred | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( SubGrp ` G ) e. ( Moore ` X ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( SubGrp ` G ) e. ( Moore ` X ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) -> A e. X ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_snssd | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) -> { A } C_ X ) |
| 9 | 3 | #P_mrccl | |- ( ( ( SubGrp ` G ) e. ( Moore ` X ) /\ { A } C_ X ) -> ( K ` { A } ) e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 8, 9 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( K ` { A } ) e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) -> N e. ZZ ) |
| 12 | 6, 3, 8 | #P_mrcssidd | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) -> { A } C_ ( K ` { A } ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_snssg | |- ( A e. X -> ( A e. ( K ` { A } ) <-> { A } C_ ( K ` { A } ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( A e. ( K ` { A } ) <-> { A } C_ ( K ` { A } ) ) ) |
| 15 | 12, 14 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) -> A e. ( K ` { A } ) ) |
| 16 | 2 | #P_subgmulgcl | |- ( ( ( K ` { A } ) e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ N e. ZZ /\ A e. ( K ` { A } ) ) -> ( N .x. A ) e. ( K ` { A } ) ) |
| 17 | 10, 11, 15, 16 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( N .x. A ) e. ( K ` { A } ) ) |
